note: Estimated from UK consumption mixture of timber products in 2007 (Timber Trade Federation statistics). Includes 4.3 MJ bio-energy. All values do not include the CV of timber product and exclude carbon storage.
Hardboard is a type of fibreboard with a density above 800 kg/m3. Includes 5.6 MJ bio-energy.
Wide density range (350-800 kg/m3). Includes 3.8 MJ bio-energy.
Estimated from Refs. 103 and 150. Includes 5.9 MJ bio-energy.
Very large data range, difficult to select appropriate values. Modified from CORRIM reports. Includes 3.2 MJ bio-energy (uncertain estimate).
It was difficult to select values for hardwood, the data was estimated from the CORRIM studies (Ref. 88). Includes 6.3 MJ bio-energy.
Unknown split of fossil based and biogenic fuels.
